languageKey.label: RealURL cleanup and regeneration
A scheduler task to clean and rebuild the RealURL tables.
Delete and generate realUrl tables (default=1) Use "0" for deleting cache tables only.
A valid FE page ID used for realUrl regeneration.
Truncate/delete cache/log tables like caches_*. cache_extensions,cache_hash,cache_imagesizes, cache_md5params,cache_pages,cache_pagesection, cache_sys_dmail_stat,cache_typo3temp_log
Delete realUrl or cache_* tables older than n hours. The "tstamp" field is required. Truncate if empty.
